name: User Registration and Authentication
description: Secure registration and login system for users to create accounts, log in, and manage their profiles.

name: Friend System
description: Every registered user is automatically considered a friend of others.

name: Assignment Creation and Management
description: Users can create new assignments, set deadlines, and upload relevant materials.

name: Assignment Submission
description: Users can submit their completed assignments before the deadline.

name: Grading System
description: Users can review and grade their friendsâ€™ assignments.

name: Notification System
description: Automated notifications for important events such as new assignments, deadlines, and grades.
